mapper.sql: datid, datname, numbackends, xact_commit, xact_rollback, blks_read, blks_hit, tup_returned, tup_fetched, tup_inserted, tup_updated, tup_deleted, conflicts, temp_files, temp_bytes, deadlocks, checksum_failures, checksum_last_failure, blk_read_time, blk_write_time, session_time, active_time, idle_in_transaction_time, sessions, sessions_abandoned, sessions_fatal, sessions_killed, parallel_workers_to_launch, parallel_workers_launched, stats_reset
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pg_stat_database
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pg_stat_database (datid, datname, numbackends, xact_commit, xact_rollback, blks_read, blks_hit, tup_returned, tup_fetched, tup_inserted, tup_updated, tup_deleted, conflicts, temp_files, temp_bytes, deadlocks, checksum_failures, checksum_last_failure, blk_read_time, blk_write_time, session_time, active_time, idle_in_transaction_time, sessions, sessions_abandoned, sessions_fatal, sessions_killed, parallel_workers_to_launch, parallel_workers_launched, stats_reset) values (#{datid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{datname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numbackends,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xactCommit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{xactRollback,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{blksRead,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{blksHit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupReturned,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupFetched,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupInserted,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupUpdated,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tupDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{conflicts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tempFiles,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tempBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deadlocks,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checksumFailures,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checksumLastFailure,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{blkReadTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{blkWriteTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sessionTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{idleInTransactionTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sessions,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sessionsAbandoned,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sessionsFatal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sessionsKilled,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parallelWorkersToLaunch,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parallelWorkersLaunched,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statsReset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update pg_stat_database
datid = #{row.datid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
datname = #{row.datname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
numbackends = #{row.numbackends,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xact_commit = #{row.xactCommit,jdbcType=BIGINT},
xact_rollback = #{row.xactRollback,jdbcType=BIGINT},
blks_read = #{row.blksRead,jdbcType=BIGINT},
blks_hit = #{row.blksHit,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tup_returned = #{row.tupReturned,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tup_fetched = #{row.tupFetched,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tup_inserted = #{row.tupInserted,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tup_updated = #{row.tupUpdated,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tup_deleted = #{row.tupDeleted,jdbcType=BIGINT},
conflicts = #{row.conflicts,jdbcType=BIGINT},
temp_files = #{row.tempFiles,jdbcType=BIGINT},
temp_bytes = #{row.tempBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deadlocks = #{row.deadlocks,jdbcType=BIGINT},
checksum_failures = #{row.checksumFailures,jdbcType=BIGINT},
checksum_last_failure = #{row.checksumLastFailure,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
blk_read_time = #{row.blkReadTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
blk_write_time = #{row.blkWriteTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
session_time = #{row.sessionTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
active_time = #{row.activeTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
idle_in_transaction_time = #{row.idleInTransactionTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sessions = #{row.sessions,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sessions_abandoned = #{row.sessionsAbandoned,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sessions_fatal = #{row.sessionsFatal,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sessions_killed = #{row.sessionsKilled,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parallel_workers_to_launch = #{row.parallelWorkersToLaunch,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parallel_workers_launched = #{row.parallelWorkersLaunched,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stats_reset = #{row.statsReset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
